title: Call for Proposals for Internally Funded Projects – 2025
description: Directorate of Research, Development & Innovation (RDI), KU invites proposals from full-time faculties of Kathmandu University under the scheme of “Internally Funded Projects”. The following two categories of projects have been chosen for this fiscal year. Please email the soft copy of your proposals (PDF) to RDI at rdi_office@ku.edu.np by January 31, 2025.
